verbose_text: Currently, all CS guidelines recommend both CIED and immune-suppression therapy for management of CS induced AVB.1, 2, 3 Despite the potential reversibility of AVB, all CS guidelines strongly recommend permanent CIED implantation due to the unpredictable disease course.1, 2, 3 Therefore, the primary role of immune-suppression is secondary prevention of cardiac dysfunction and ventricular arrhythmias.
